cancellationPolicies.label: Free Cancellation rates
cancellationPolicies.description: If you cancel your booking before 23:59 10th Nov 2025 (AEST) your deposit will be refunded to your payment card. If you cancel after 23:59 10th Nov 2025 (AEST) or in the event of a no-show, your deposit will not be refunded and the total of the first night's accommodation will be charged to your payment card, unless otherwise stated (see 'Things to Note' information). Please note that cancellations must be made directly within your booking in My Account.

dorms.name: Basic 8 Bed Mixed Dorm
dorms.description: Dormitory style and range in size from 2 beds upwards.  They offer mixed accommodation.
dorms.labelDescription:
8 Bed dorm with 4 x double bunks.  - Private balcony 
Stay on budget and meet new friends without compromising on comfort 
Airconditioning/ fans
All new bed mattress /linen and comfortable pillows!
Oversized individual lockers for personal storage.

paymentProcedure.label: Deposit only
paymentProcedure.description:
Deposit only
Your deposit will be non-refundable unless the Standard Flexible Booking option is available and you select it. T&C apply.

rateRuleViolationsMessages.description: Requires a minimum of 7 nights stay on your dates

dorms.name: Basic 6 Bed Mixed Dorm
dorms.description: Dormitory style and range in size from 2 beds upwards.  They offer mixed accommodation.
dorms.labelDescription:
6 Bed dorm with 3 x double bunks. 
A great way to stay on budget, meet new friends without compromising on comfort or style
Airconditioning/ fans in each room
All new Bed mattress / linen / pillows!
Oversized individual lockers for personal storage.

paymentProcedure.label: Deposit only
paymentProcedure.description:
Deposit only
Your deposit will be non-refundable unless the Standard Flexible Booking option is available and you select it. T&C apply.

rateRuleViolationsMessages.description: Requires a minimum of 2 nights stay on your dates

All new bed and mattress linen and extra comfortable pillows!
